patthana16.28:4.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.28:4.2: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.28:4.3: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.28:4.4: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu ca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.28:4.5: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo nahetu ca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.28:5.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.28:6.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.28:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā aṭṭha … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke dasa … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.28:8.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.28:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
